Description_lang: |cFFFF8040Klaxxi Enhancement|rGranted by Malik the UnscathedAbsorbed, blocked, dodged, missed, parried, redirected, reflected, and resisted attacks against the bearer cause Bladeturning.|Tinterface\icons\ability_parry.blp:24|t |cFFFFD200Bladeturning|rUpon reaching 10 stacks of Bladeturning, deal damage and stun all nearby enemies for 3 seconds.Only one |cFFFF8040Klaxxi Enhancement|r can be active at a time. Only effective in Dread Wastes.
